U.S. Policy of Strength Assailed
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received floral baskets from the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) and his party and a delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of Kimilsungism on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of his birthday.
 They were separately conveyed to an official concerned by Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, and Masaharu Ueki, secretary general of the society who is heading the delegation, on February 16.

articles.content:
Greetings to Gambian President
    Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Feb. 11 sent a message of greetings to Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh, president of the Republic of Gambia, on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will continue to favorably develop, the message sincerely wished the president and the people of Gambia greater success in their work for the development and prosperity of the country.
